title: Identifying Prodigal Children
itunes:author: Guests: Pastor Bill Putman and Pastor Jim Putman
itunes:summary: It's painful to watch older children stray from the Christian life. John and Danny offer encouragement to parents with prodigal children. Featuring Pastor Bill Putman and Pastor Jim Putman. Find us online at focusonthefamily.com/parentingpodcast. Or, call 1-800-A-FAMILY.
